mods.abstract: Female adult, all shell doll, bottle cleaner wire arms, painted features, shell bonnet with ribbon, ribbon sash, shell hand-bag, shell parasol, shell dress has tiered skirt, all, hand-made. Accompanying information describes that shell doll was made in Florida Bottom of doll has name 'Layten'.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
